property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

properties.property:
'''First visit:''' A draft blows, and you feel the cold night's presence. Still, this never bothered you. In fact...
'''Second visit, pre-[[Tenna]] battle:''' The wind blows fiercely, as if it fears the night itself. The final act draws near.
'''Post-Tenna battle:''' Your hand lingers in the bright light. The light, which only you can see... A strange calm washes over you.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] must reveal the passcode to unlock the door to the next room. Here, the passcode is "213".

property.name: page
property.value: TV World/Puzzles#The first parental lock puzzle

property.name: description
property.value: Map of the first Parental Lock Puzzle, with proper orientation.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] must maneuver their way around the room and unlock the door leading to the passcode. Here, the passcode is "1225".

property.name: page
property.value: TV World/Puzzles#The second parental lock puzzle

property.name: description
property.value: Map of the second Parental Lock Puzzle, with proper orientation.

property.name: description
property.value: When entering the [[Cold Place]] for the second time, the Parental Lock Puzzles are condensed into a single room containing a third puzzle. [[Kris]] is placed inside a replica of [[Dreemurr Residence|their house]] and must make their way to the TV in their living room. From there, they must solve two puzzles involving [[Susie]]'s character and retrieve the [[camera]], which reveals the passcode when a picture is taken. Here, the passcode is "000000". If the [[Sword Route]] is completed, the TV does not turn on, and the door is automatically unlocked.

property.name: page
property.value: TV World/Puzzles#The third parental lock puzzle

property.name: description
property.value: Interacting with the TV transports [[Kris]] to the main puzzle area.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] must use either their character or [[Susie]]'s to transfer the block to the pressure plate.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] must use [[Susie]]'s character to construct a bridge across the lake.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] must take a photo with the [[camera]] anywhere in this area to reveal the passcode.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] stops [[Kris]] while [[Susie]] walks ahead and requests that they ask Susie how she is doing. Kris can comply, ask Ralsei how he is doing, or not speak at all.

property.name: description
property.value: On their first visit to the Cold Place, the [[party]] notices [[Toriel]] trapped in a gachapon ball. Before they can rescue her, [[Tenna]] suddenly arrives and notices them. He then forces them into another round of [[TV Time]].

property.name: description
property.value: As [[Tenna]] releases [[Toriel]] from her gachapon capsule, the [[Knight]] stikes him down and initiates a battle against the [[party]].

property.name: description
property.value: After the battle against the [[Knight]], [[Undyne]] arrives and attacks it. The Knight then captures Undyne and escapes into the Light World.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] and [[Kris]] discover a [[Great Door]] that leads into the Light World, outside the [[Dreemurr residence]].

property.name: description
property.value: A camera that [[Kris]] can use to reveal the passcode to the door.

property.name: description
property.value: Boss battle against Tenna on the second visit to the Cold Place.

property.name: page
property.value: Tenna#Cold Place Encounter

property.name: description
property.value: Boss battle against the Roaring Knight. Drops a [[Shadow Crystal]] and a [[Black Shard]] upon defeat.

property.name: page
property.value: Knight#In battle

property.name: description
property.value: Doorway back to the Green Room, the main hub of the TV World.

property.name: page
property.value: Green Room

property.value: Doorway back to the Green Room, the main hub of the TV World.
